google_places.text: I have been coming here for years the food is always wonderful! Although my palate has changed since being a child and ordering chocolate chip pancakes. Today we ordered the Irish Benedict and the chicken and waffles both dishes were phenomenal!! Our server was so friendly and attentive. She even had the kitchen divide each order in to 2 plates so we were able to sample. That was such a great idea.

Always a comfortable setting the staff if always sweet and attentive. The food is great classic American breakfast, great lunch and dinner (italian,american,comfort) of and may I just brag about there chicken and waffles the best!

When I opened my plate I said wt* is this! I ordered stuffed French toast which was made with grinder bread 😳 This had to be 6”thick. Like how can anyone eat that. No strawberries inside but they gave me a freezing cold size of strawberries in juice (not sweetened). This was $15. My husbands bacon also looked shredded and fatty. I wanted regular breakfast with beans but saw that a side of beans is $6.29! You can make a 5 quart pot for that price.

yelp_api.text: Good experience at Bellingham Palace. Would recommend.
Good experience at Bellingham Palace. Would recommend.
Good experience at Bellingham Palace. Would recommend.

web_scraped.text: Great pizza place with excellent service. The staff is friendly and the food is always fresh. Highly recommend the pepperoni pizza.
Had a wonderful experience here. The atmosphere is cozy and the prices are reasonable. Will definitely come back.
Great pizza place with excellent service. The staff is friendly and the food is always fresh. Highly recommend the pepperoni pizza.

google_places.text: Ordered a meatball sub and like everything today we’re not getting whole meatballs on today’s economy…that being said…everything from the bread to the peppers was very fresh. Made unique; seasoned excellently. The meatballs were tender, I don’t know if made in house but whatever was done was fantastic.

If your gonna mail me your menu and if I want to order from your restaurant- make sure your professionalism and your willingness to provide the delivery is available ! Stop sending me your menus because not even given the chance to order from your place and getting a bad review.

BAD HIT
Without a foubtthe best pizza I have had in my 30 years of living. The perfect balance between sauce and cheese. And when it comes to the taste... Second to none. Well done to the chef!

google_places.text: Not sure what’s going on lately, but they can’t seem to get the orders right. Paid for extra ranch on my BBQ chicken, bacon ranch pizza and got zero ranch but extra cheese. Today I asked for my steak and cheese sub to be extra toasted and it wasn’t toasted at all. Always order online so I know they see what I ordered. Starting to think twice about this place. It’s not what it used to be!

The girls who take my order over the phone have me repeating everything, like theyre drifting off into space. Food is awesome, service not so much. It’s funny when the male employee takes the order much better over the phone.

Oh first time we came here we was driving by and we found a place the boneless buffalo chicken perfect very juicy the french fries super good and crispy and the chicken cutlet. Awesome. I would recommend this place to everybody good customer service very clean, very friendly.Nick  was super excellent service 10+
